title: pUlu callarE
sahitya:
pUlu callarE puNDarIkAkSunipai puvva bONulAra mIru dEva pArijAta


anupallavi

  vAlugaNTi sItA sahituDaina rAmuDu jAli jendina bhaktavarulanu cAla prItitO brOcunamma


caraNam 1   bAla prAyamu nATi mOdalagu jAlakayyamulu jEsi tanujAla 
kAluni gruhamunaku bampina nIlamEgha shyAmupai jAji
    caraNam 2    kammaviltu taNDri rAmuDu komma sItanu peNDliyADa 
ammarO rAvaNAsuruniki kommu pagilenu gadavE tAmara
    caraNam 3    sadAshiva vidhi vinutuDipuDu sambhramamutO nunnADu 
sadA dInula brOvumani mIru cAla vEDarE manci sampangi
